about_text: Hello! I'm Julián Narváez, a Systems Engineer and IoT Specialist with over 15 years of experience in ERP systems, databases, networks, servers, and web development. I am currently focused on data analytics, aiming to design innovative and efficient solutions that generate real value. My passion for technology has led me to especially enjoy creating projects that come alive on the internet. Since 2022, I discovered in web development an opportunity to combine creativity and technical knowledge, exploring new ways to build digital experiences that positively impact people and organizations.
exp_iot_description: Postgraduate degree focused on the design, development, and implementation of connected solutions, ranging from hardware and sensors to software platforms and data analysis.
exp_syseng_description: Systems Engineer with experience in software development, network and database administration, IT management, and information security auditing. Oriented towards innovation and technological research.
exp_coord_description: Manage network infrastructure, administer Windows and Linux servers. Administer the company's ERP software, ensuring its operation and providing user support. Develop web applications that generate value for internal company processes.
exp_aux_description: Level 1 support for internal users, Linux server administration, and managing information security.
exp_security_title: Technological Specialist in Computer Network Security
exp_security_description: Ability to diagnose, design, implement, and monitor information security systems based on international standards. Expert in developing security plans, incident management, policies, ISMS, and tools such as IDS/firewalls. With an ethical vision and oriented towards innovation and continuous training.
proj_inventarios_desc: Advanced web module to digitize and automate the lifecycle of equipment loans, eliminating manual tracking and providing a centralized, auditable platform.
proj_reevo_desc: Modern and responsive landing page for the presentation of the 'RE-EVO 2030' strategic planning, serving as an information platform for a corporate event.
proj_vinculacion_desc: Web application to manage and monitor the personnel onboarding process, centralizing applicant information and standardizing the tracking of hiring phases.
articles_subtitle: I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge. Here are some articles I have written about technologies, management, and my journey into data analytics.
article1_title: My First Steps with Python and Pandas
article1_desc: A look at my learning journey, from environment setup to my first data manipulations.
article2_title: How a Systems Engineer Views the World of IoT
article2_desc: A reflection on how experience in traditional infrastructure becomes an advantage when implementing IoT solutions.
contact_subtitle: I am interested in opportunities to collaborate on innovative and challenging projects. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me via the form or my social networks.
footer_text: Designed and built by Julian Narvaez
